1310790.name: The Adventures of Eggbert
1310790.description:
Step into a fast-paced retro arcade adventure with Eggbert, a daring red bird on a mission! In this classic-style platformer your goal is simpleâ€”but far from easy:

ğŸ¥š Collect eggs that randomly appear across the level.
ğŸ¦Š Avoid the cunning foxes that get faster and more relentless over time.
ğŸ£ Hold onto the eggs until they hatch to earn points and climb the leaderboard!

With pixel-perfect platforming, increasing difficulty, and that addictive "just one more try" feel, Eggbert delivers the perfect blend of nostalgia and challenge.

Can you outsmart the foxes and become the ultimate egg-hatching champion?
